akn:section.akn:heading: Voluntary arbitration of certain rail rates and practices disputes

akn:content.akn:p: (a) Not later than 1 year after the date of the enactment of the Surface Transportation Board Reauthorization Act of 2015, the Board shall promulgate regulations to establish a voluntary and binding arbitration process to resolve rail rate and practice complaints subject to the jurisdiction of the Board.
